DataElement.preferredName: Past Year Health Care Provider Patient Visit Occurrence Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Text term to signify whether a patient visited any healthcare provider in the past calendar year.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Past Year Health Care Provider Patient Visit Occurrence
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Before the present time._A period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun, approximately 365 days; a specific one year period._Persons who provides health care as part of their job responsibilities: or a person or organization who is licensed to supply health care._A clinical encounter that encompasses planned and unplanned trial interventions, procedures and assessments that may be performed on a subject._A visit by a patient or study participant to a medical professional._An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Before the present time.:A period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun, approximately 365 days; a specific one year period.:Persons who provides health care as part of their job responsibilities: or a person or organization who is licensed to supply health care.

Concepts.definition: A period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun, approximately 365 days; a specific one year period.
Persons who provides health care as part of their job responsibilities: or a person or organization who is licensed to supply health care.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.
